name: MooTools Accessible Sortable List
author: Votis Konstantinos

sections.description:
MooTools Accessible Sortable List is a sortable list of your blog’s categories which uses the MooTools WAI-ARIA enabled sortable list.

How to Use the List

Up arrow / Down arrow: Navigates through the items
Shift + Up arrow / Shift + Down arrow: Moves the current item up / down
Enter: Open the link related to the selected item

Acknowledgments

This work was supported by the Informatics and Telematics Institute (ITI) of the Centre of Research and Technology Hellas (CERTH) in the premices of the AEGIS project.
sections.installation:
Upgrading From A Previous Version

To upgrade from a previous version of this plugin, delete the entire folder and files from the previous version of the plugin and then follow the installation instructions below.

Uploading The Plugin

Extract all files from the ZIP file, making sure to keep the file/folder structure intact, and then upload it to /wp-content/plugins/.

See Also: “Installing Plugins” article on the WP Codex

Plugin Activation

Go to the admin area of your WordPress installation and click on the “Plugins” menu. Click on “Activate” for the plugin.

Plugin Setup

Go to the admin area of your WordPress installation and select the “Widgets” submenu of the “Appearance” menu.
